channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Surgeons Are Revealing Their Wildest And Scariest Moments They've Had Mid-Procedure, And I'm Screaming
The FBI mistakenly raided their Atlanta home. Now the Supreme Court will hear their lawsuit
For nearly 60 days, Israel has blocked food from Gaza. Palestinians struggle to feed their families
Arrest made in the theft of Kristi Noemâ€™s purse and thousands in cash, source says
Detective's affair exposed during wife's murder investigation
item.description: Brian Fanion says he and his wife Amy Fanion had been arguing about his retirement plans when she picked up his service weapon and shot herself. Inves...

item.title: 'Number of people' killed as driver plows into crowd, Vancouver police say
item.description: "The driver is in custody," the Vancouver Police Department said in a social media post.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Judge releases 2 migrants, rips evidence in TdA gang case
item.description: He headed to the new military immigration enforcement area without reporters.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Trump has lowest 100-day approval rating in 80 years: POLL
item.description: Donald Trump has the lowest 100-day job approval rating of any president in the past 80 years, according to an ABC News/Washington Post/Ipsos poll.

item.title: 4/26: Saturday Morning
item.description: Pope Francis is laid to rest after Vatican City funeral; Rock band Goose opens up about new album "Everything Must Go."

item.title: The Detective's Wife
item.description: Police investigate one of their own when a detective becomes a suspect in the shooting death of his wife. "48 Hours" contributor Nikki Battiste report...

item.title: Detective visits gunshot residue testing site days before wife killed
item.description: Massachusetts investigators uncover a suspicious web history after Brian Fanion reports his wife Amy's death as a suicide.

item.title: WATCH: Bear spotted playing on family's backyard slide
item.description: A Connecticut family got a chance to see a bear have some fun on their backyard playset earlier this month.

item.title: 21 Photos Of Employers From Hell That Seem Photoshopped, But Are, Unfortunately, 100% Real
Wife of US Coast Guard member arrested over expired visa after security check for military housing
WATCH: 'Make a Wish' kids call NFL draft picks
item.description: Two special football fans have their dreams come true when experiencing one of the biggest nights in professional football at the 2025 NFL Draft.

item.title: US judge temporarily stops west Texas immigrant deportations under Alien Enemies Act
ICE deports immigrant mother of an infant and 3 children who are US citizens, lawyers say
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers have in recent days deported a Cuban-born mother of a 1-year-old girl, separating them indefinitely.
